scheme_name: Consolidated Stipend Scheme for Scheduled Caste Students Pursuing Higher Education
details: The scheme aims to attract Scheduled Caste (SC) students towards higher education and provide financial support to cover miscellaneous expenses.
benefits: Stipend Amount: Eligible SC students receive ₹1,000/- per month.
Hostel Stipend: Additional ₹500/- per month for 12 months for students availing hostel facilities.
eligibility: The applicant should belong to the Scheduled Caste (SC) category.
The applicant should be a domicile of Haryana.
The applicant should be studying in a government college in Haryana.
The applicant should have passed the previous academic year examination.
The applicant should maintain at least 60% attendance to receive the stipend.
application_process: Online registration on the Har-Chhatravratti Portal (Centralized Scholarship Portal) of the Department of Higher Education, Haryana.
Fill in the online form of the scheme, upload all the mandatory documents, and submit the application.
documents_required: Last Exam Passed Certificate (Except for 1st Year Students)
